mapper.sql: ID, COMP_ID, PARTNER_NAME, ENTERPRISE_CREDIT_CODE, JOIN_TIME, USER_ID, MANAGER_USER_ID, IS_DEL, DEL_USER_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PARTNER_ADDR, PARTNER_TELE, PLOT_SWITCH
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from FUN_PARTNER
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into FUN_PARTNER (COMP_ID, PARTNER_NAME, ENTERPRISE_CREDIT_CODE, JOIN_TIME, USER_ID, MANAGER_USER_ID, IS_DEL, DEL_USER_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PARTNER_ADDR, PARTNER_TELE, PLOT_SWITCH) values (#{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterpriseCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{managerUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{partnerAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partnerTele,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plotSwitch,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into FUN_PARTNER
COMP_ID,
PARTNER_NAME,
ENTERPRISE_CREDIT_CODE,
JOIN_TIME,
USER_ID,
MANAGER_USER_ID,
IS_DEL,

mapper.update:
update FUN_PARTNER
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMP_ID = #{record.compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PARTNER_NAME = #{record.partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENTERPRISE_CREDIT_CODE = #{record.enterpriseCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOIN_TIME = #{record.joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MANAGER_USER_ID = #{record.managerUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_DEL = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
DEL_USER_ID = #{record.delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PARTNER_ADDR = #{record.partnerAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTNER_TELE = #{record.partnerTele,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLOT_SWITCH = #{record.plotSwitch,jdbcType=TINYINT},

update FUN_PARTNER set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMP_ID = #{record.compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PARTNER_NAME = #{record.partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTERPRISE_CREDIT_CODE = #{record.enterpriseCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOIN_TIME = #{record.joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MANAGER_USER_ID = #{record.managerUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_DEL = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DEL_USER_ID = #{record.delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PARTNER_ADDR = #{record.partnerAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTNER_TELE = #{record.partnerTele,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLOT_SWITCH = #{record.plotSwitch,jdbcType=TINYINT}

update FUN_PARTNER
COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PARTNER_NAME = #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENTERPRISE_CREDIT_CODE = #{enterpriseCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOIN_TIME = #{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MANAGER_USER_ID = #{managerUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
DEL_USER_ID = #{delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PARTNER_ADDR = #{partnerAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTNER_TELE = #{partnerTele,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLOT_SWITCH = #{plotSwitch,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update FUN_PARTNER set COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PARTNER_NAME = #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTERPRISE_CREDIT_CODE = #{enterpriseCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOIN_TIME = #{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MANAGER_USER_ID = #{managerUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DEL_USER_ID = #{delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PARTNER_ADDR = #{partnerAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTNER_TELE = #{partnerTele,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLOT_SWITCH = #{plotSwitch,jdbcType=TINYINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) from FUN_PARTNER where ENTERPRISE_CREDIT_CODE = #{enterpriseCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and IS_DEL = 0
select count(*) from FUN_PARTNER where PARTNER_NAME = #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and IS_DEL = 0

select
from FUN_PARTNER where COMP_ID = #{compId} and ID = #{id} and IS_DEL = 0

select
from FUN_PARTNER where COMP_ID = #{compId} and IS_DEL = 0

select distinct A.ID, A.COMP_ID, A.PARTNER_NAME, A.ENTERPRISE_CREDIT_CODE, A.JOIN_TIME, A.USER_ID, A.MANAGER_USER_ID,A.CREATE_TIME,A.PARTNER_TELE,A.PARTNER_ADDR from FUN_PARTNER A
left join FUN_ORGANIZATION B on A.ID=B.PARTNER_ID left join FUN_USERS C on C.COMP_ID = A.COMP_ID and C.USER_ID = A.USER_ID
where A.COMP_ID = #{param.compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and( A.PARTNER_NAME like '%${param.fuzzySearch}%' or C.USER_NAME like '%${param.fuzzySearch}%' or B.ORGANIZATION_NAME like '%${param.fuzzySearch}%')
and A.IS_DEL = 0 order by A.JOIN_TIME desc

select
from FUN_PARTNER where COMP_ID = #{compId} and (USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or MANAGER_USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) and IS_DEL = 0

select A.DEPT_ID as deptId,A.DEPT_CNAME deptCname,A.COMP_NO as compNo,A.DEPT_NO as deptNo,A.AREA_ID as areaId,A.REG_ID as regId, B.COOPERATE_START_TIME as cooperateStartTime,B.COOPERATE_END_TIME as cooperateEndTime, A.PARTNER_ID as partnerId,C.PARTNER_NAME as partnerName,(case when A.PARTNER_ID> 0 then 1 when A.PARTNER_ID=0 then 2 else 0 end )as partnerType from FUN_DEPTS A left join FUN_PARTNER_DEPT B on A.COMP_ID=B.COMP_ID and A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID and B.IS_DEL = 0 left join FUN_PARTNER C on C.ID = B.PARTNER_ID where A.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} and A.DEPT_FLAG in (1,2)
and C.ID = #{param.partnerId}
and A.PARTNER_ID = -1
and A.PARTNER_ID > 0
and A.PARTNER_ID = 0
and A.DEPT_NO in
#{item}
order by A.UPDATE_TIME desc
